name: observable-object-es6
description: Small library with observable object for use in browser, node and es6 based on event-emitter-es6.

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run bundle-node
scripts.bundle: browserify index.es6 > dist/observable-object.js -s ObservableObject -t [ babelify ] && echo "bundled"
scripts.bundle-node: babel index.es6 -o index.js && echo "bundled for node"

author: insane-jo
